title: Backyard Boy
lyrics: Dance with me in my backyard boy Looking super fine in your corduroy Drive me round the block And we’ll turn the volume up on some Love to feel the fresh air And I’m not gonna lie My heart is on wings And at the top of our lungs we sing Da da da da da da Everything is perfect Da da da da da da All our words were worth it Da da da da da da Dancing around like a clown at the circus Da da da da da da Backyard boy you make me nervous Dance with me in my backyard boy Looking super fine in your corduroy (5 6 7 8) Roll the windows down And everybody’s talking Feel the fresh air And I’m not gonna lie My heart is on wings And at the top of our lungs we sing Da da da da da da Everything is perfect Da da da da da da All our words were worth it Da da da da da da Dancing around like a clown at the circus Da da da da da da Backyard boy you make me nervous
